category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_SGAll_file_type_xsl_names
preference.preference_description: Specifies XSL files and mode of import separated by colon (:) character to be used to convert International Material Data System (IMDS) Substance Group (SG) XML file into TC-XML file.
